message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think would be perfect for you. It's worth at least $10,000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,500.  What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $8,000 on this product. Would you consider lowering the price to meet my budget?

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints. While I can't go as low as $8,000, I'm willing to come down to $9,000 to make this deal work.  This is still a good price for both of us, and I believe this product will be a great asset to your business. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering our conversation, I am still interested in purchasing the product but would like to stick to my budget of $8,000. Could you possibly meet me halfway?
